To assess use serum marker predictor response outcome . OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study gemcitabine hydrochloride dasatinib . Patients receive gemcitabine hydrochloride intravenously ( IV ) 30-60 minute day 1 , 8 , 15 , dasatinib orally ( PO ) daily ( QD ) erlotinib hydrochloride PO QD day 1-28 .
